tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE insurance_claims_data (
    claim_id INT,
    policy_number INT,
    claim_date DATE,
    claim_amount DECIMAL,
    policy_holder_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE historical_insurance_claims (
 claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 policy_number VARCHAR,
 claim_date DATE,
 claim_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE risk_forecasting (
 claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 policy_number VARCHAR,
 claim_date DATE,
 risk_score DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE InsuranceClaims (
    claim_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_holder_id INT NOT NULL,
    claim_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    claim_date DATE NOT NULL,
    is_fraud BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE PolicyHolders (
    policy_holder_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    last_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    age INT NOT NULL,
    gender VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE RiskForecasting (
    risk_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    claim_id INT NOT NULL,
    policy_holder_id INT NOT NULL,
    risk_score DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    forecast_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE insurance_claims (
  claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_number INT,
  claim_date DATE,
  claim_type VARCHAR(50),
  claim_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE policyholders (
  policy_number INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policyholder_name VARCHAR(100),
  policy_start_date DATE,
  policy_end_date DATE,
  premium_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE claim_history (
  claim_id INT,
  risk_id INT,
  claim_status VARCHAR(20),
  claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  CONSTRAINT fk_claim_history_claim_id FOREIGN KEY (claim_id) REFERENCES insurance_claims(claim_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_claim_history_risk_id FOREIGN KEY (risk_id) REFERENCES risk_factors(risk_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Insurance_Claims (
  claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_no INT,
  claim_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
  claim_date DATE,
  claim_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Claims_History (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  claim_id INT,
  claim_date DATE,
  settlement_date DATE,
  settlement_amount DECIMAL(10,2)
);
